title: Authors and Citation
text: Raphael Saldanha. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Saldanha R (2022). brpop: Brazilian Population Estimatives. R package version 0.1.2, https://rfsaldanha.github.io/brpop/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {brpop: Brazilian Population Estimatives},   author = {Raphael Saldanha},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.2},   url = {https://rfsaldanha.github.io/brpop/}, }

title: Brazilian Population Estimatives
text: brpop R package provides yearly (2000 2021) Brazilian population estimates DataSUS/Brazilian Health Ministry, aggregated state, municipality, sex, age groups. estimates especially useful calculating age sex standardized disease rates. population estimates downloaded manually DataSUS website converted tibbles convenient use. population estimation method can accessed .

title: Brazilian Population Estimatives
text: Stable release CRAN. Development version GitHub.

title: Brazilian Population Estimatives
text: package provides dataset two files containing population estimates municipalities sex two files population estimates states (UFs) sex. function mun_pop aggregates municipalities’ estimates sex, resulting tibble overall population estimates. function takes arguments. function mun_sex_pop binds estimates sex single tibble new variable called sex. function takes arguments. functions uf_pop uf_sex_pop work way, providing UF population estimates. functions take arguments.
code: head(mun_female_pop) head(mun_male_pop)  head(uf_female_pop) head(uf_male_pop) mun_pop() mun_sex_pop() uf_pop() uf_sex_pop()

what: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group — mun_female_pop
title: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group — mun_female_pop
text: dataset containing female population estimates Brazilian municipalities per age groups 2000 2021.

title: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group — mun_female_pop
Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group — mun_female_pop
text: tibble 2,216,016 rows 4 variables: mun municipality 6 digits code year year estimative age_group age group pop population estimative

title: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group — mun_female_pop
text: http://tabnet.datasus.gov.br/cgi/deftohtm.exe?popsvs/cnv/popbr.def

title: Municipality yearly female population estimates per age group — mun_female_pop
text: estimates calculated DataSUS (Brazilian Ministry Health), manually downloaded DataSUS website, organized tibble. details estimation methodology may found : http://tabnet.datasus.gov.br/cgi/POPSVS/NT-POPULACAO-RESIDENTE-2000-2021.PDF
